definition: Titan (race of deities in Greek mythology, moon of Saturn etc)
Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong/abbr. for Thailand
RMS Titanic, British passenger liner that sank in 1912

sentences.english: Any of the three one-eyed Titans who forged thunderbolts for Zeus.
sentences.chinese: 幫助宙斯製造雷電地三個獨眼泰坦神之一。
《泰坦尼克號》獲得14項提名和11個小金人。

sentences.english: This maiden voyage of Titanic must make headlines.
sentences.chinese: 泰坦尼克號的處女航必須成爲頭版頭條。

sentences.english: It is a fictionalized account of the sinking of the RMS Titanic.
sentences.chinese: 這是一部根據RMS泰坦尼克號沉沒改編的小說。

sentences.english: The story of the " unsinkable " luxury liner Titanic has fascinated people for nearly a century.
sentences.chinese: 人們對永不沉沒的泰坦尼克號豪華輪着迷近一個世紀。

sentences.english: Location. Titanic De Luxe Beach and Resort Hotel is located near Antalya, Turkey.
sentences.chinese: 泰坦尼克號海灘度假酒店臨近土耳其的安塔利亞。

sentences.english: Dwarves took the primordial methods of producing titanscale armor from the titans and giants.
sentences.chinese: 矮人用來自泰坦和巨人的上古工藝製作泰坦鱗甲。

sentences.english: Dwarves took the primordial methods of producing titanscale armor from the titans and giants.
sentences.chinese: 矮人用來自泰坦和巨人的上古工藝製作泰坦鱗甲。

sentences.english: Nbsp; It was so profound I phoned Titan to tell him about it.
sentences.chinese: 它是如此深刻我打電話給泰坦告訴他有關這。

sentences.english: Four days after the Titanic set out, a very big iceberg floated towards her.
sentences.chinese: 泰坦尼克號出發四天以後，一座巨大的冰山向它漂來。

sentences.english: Any of the three one-eyed Ttans ho forged thunderbolts for Zeus.
sentences.chinese: 幫助宙斯製造雷電的三個獨眼泰坦神之一。

sentences.english: Its distinctive smell can be detected from half a mile away.
sentences.chinese: 泰坦魔芋花獨特的氣味在半英里外就能聞到。

sentences.english: His wife was Amphitrite, a granddaughter of the Titan, Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 他的太太是泰坦神大洋氏的孫女安屈蒂。

sentences.english: The Titan is the basic tier one battle mech for the Steel Talons.
sentences.chinese: 泰坦是鋼爪陣營的初級戰鬥機甲。

sentences.english: The all consuming struggle between the Titans and the Olympians rages on.
sentences.chinese: 泰坦與奧林匹斯衆神之間毀天滅地的鬥爭持續進行着。

sentences.english: The Titans acknowledgmented him by a battery of great rocks and upabiding copse.
sentences.chinese: 泰坦們拔起大樹，並且擲出一陣亂石答覆了他。

definition: Loki, god of fire and mischievous destroyer in Norse mythology
Lucifer (Satan's name before his fall in Jewish and Christian mythology)
